headline.main: ACCUSED NAZI SPY BLAMES HIS WIFE; Testifies He Resisted Her Attempts to Involve Him in Ring in This Country ADMITS RECEIVING BOOKS Witness Says He Canceled Plans to Bring Wife Here When He Suspected Her

lead_paragraph: An accused Nazi espionage agent testified yesterday at the Brooklyn espionage trial that he had successfully resisted attempts by his German wife to involve him in what he believed to be a spy ring in this country.
abstract: H C Eilers, naturalized U S citizen, blames Nazi wife for books received from Heine; Stimson comments on subpoena
snippet: An accused Nazi espionage agent testified yesterday at the Brooklyn espionage trial that he had successfully resisted attempts by his German wife to involve him in what he believed to be a spy ring in this country....
